Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SB Piscidin 7 (SB P7, natural AMPs; fish, animals; UCLL1a)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of THE PEPTIDE shows 75% similarity toWB Piscidin 6.Activity: fish pathogens S-iniae (MIC >32.11 uM), L. garvieae (MIC 32.11 uM), V. anguillarum (MIC 8.03 uM), A-salmonicida (MIC>32.11 uM), human pathogens E-faecalis (MIC >32.11 uM), S-aureus (MIC >32.11 uM), S-flexneri (MIC >32.11 uM), and E-coli (MIC >32.11 uM). Its minimum parasiticidal concentrations (PCmin <0.25 uM; PC100 1.00 uM).Updated 4/2024
Literature Information.Author: Salger SA, Cassady KR, Reading BJ, Noga EJ.2016
Literature Information.Title: A Diverse Family of Host-Defense Peptides (Piscidins) Exhibit Specialized Anti-Bacterial and Anti-Protozoal Activities in Fishes
